Text: Doesn't work if you burn it straight to a CD, of course, but if you copy the contents to a USB pen drive, then insert it into the front USB ports of the XBOX you'll get the "Update found" pop-up instantly. Thanks for loading this! Saved me possibly weeks of having to wait for MS to mail me a new one.
